stimulusHtml: The graph of a function f is shown above. Which of the following statements about f is false?
choicesHtml: f has a relative maximum at x = a.

lim x→ a + f( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41FF@ is equal to lim x→ a − f( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@420A@

lim x→a f( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40C5@ exists
